q: what is good for planting trees
pred: Planting trees is a great way to improve the environment and provide shade, oxygen, and a habitat for wildlife. Trees also help reduce air pollution, improve water quality, and provide aesthetic value to the landscape. However, it is essential to plant trees in the right location and at the right time to ensure their growth and survival. The video shows a woman planting a tree in the ground, which is a great way to contribute to the environment and create a more sustainable future.
